Electric toys

Electric toys (Constructional sets; experimentalsets; functional toys (having a function to anappliance or installation used by adults) andvideo toys (toys having a screen and means ofactivation, such as a joystick or keyboard;Separate screens having a rated voltage of morethan 24 v are not considered to be part of thetoy). Toys using electricity for secondaryfunctions are also within the scope of thisstandard (a dolls house having an interior lamp isan example of such a toy).
